SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.contact.search

Class ContactSearchResult

java.lang.Object
gw.plugin.contact.search.ContactSearchResult
public class ContactSearchResult extends Object
Represents the results returned from the search of the remote contact management system. Note that the Contacts returned by getContacts() may not be a complete representation of those Contacts in the Contact System. Check the documentation for the ContactSystemPlugin implementation to see if these Contacts are just partial Contacts to allow a user to select one from the collection.

  • Method Details

    • getNumberOfResults

      public int getNumberOfResults()
      Returns the number of results.
      Returns:
      The number of results

    • isCountOnly

      public boolean isCountOnly()
      Returns true if the result is a count-only, i.e. no actual contacts were retrieved.
      Returns:
      True if count-only

    • getContacts

      public Collection<Contact> getContacts()
      Returns the contact search results. Note that the returned collection is immutable: any attempt to call add() or remove() on it will throw an exception and leave the collection unmodified. Note that the Contacts in this collection may not be a complete representation of those Contacts in the Contact System. Check the documentation for the ContactSystemPlugin implementation to see if these Contacts are just partial Contacts to allow a user to select one from the collection.
      Returns:
      The search results
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If isCountOnly() returns true
